profile.history: The Northwest Jiu-Jitsu Academy is one of the oldest and largest Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu schools in the Seattle area, located in Seattle, Washington near Green Lake.  Owner and chief instructor Brian Johnson is 3-time world champion and 5th-degree black belt, awarded to him by the legendary Rigan Machado and endorsed by the Machado Brothers.  Northwest Jiu-Jitsu Academy offers kid, teen, and adult Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu classes, in addition to women's classes, circuit training, and competition training.

intro.title: 5-week Beginner's Course
bullets: Curriculum - our own hand-made curriculum, formulated by Professor Brian Johnson, gives you a full picture of Brazilian Jiu Jitsu.
Starting BJJ with a group of experienced people can be hard.  You'll be starting the course with other beginners, so you're all on the same page.
Get a free NWJJA gi, and get access to free circuit training classes during the 5-week course.

courses.name: Basic Jiu Jitsu
courses.desc: Great for anyone from beginners to black belts, these courses cover the fundamental concepts and techniques we use in jiu jitsu.

courses.name: Advanced Jiu Jitsu
courses.desc: After you understand jiu jitsu as a whole, we can start to explore the more complex systems used in jiu jitsu, and learn how they all connect.

courses.name: Women's Jiu Jitsu
courses.desc: Led by women, come learn and train with other women.

courses.name: Kids 4-10
courses.desc: Kids learn body movement, balance, and have a ton of fun!

courses.name: Teens 11-14
courses.desc: Teens learn and refine positions, movements, and techniques.
